original_text: The Lord began to speak to Hosea with a message for his people. The Lord said to Hosea, ‘Go and marry a prostitute. She will give birth to children for you, as a prostitute. That will show how my people have not been faithful to me. They have turned away from me, the Lord, and they have served other gods.’
korean_text: 여호와께서 처음 호세아에게 말씀하실 때 여호와께서 호세아에게 이르시되 너는 가서 음란한 여자를 맞이하여 음란한 자식들을 낳으라 이 나라가 여호와를 떠나 크게 음란함이니라 하시니

sentences.original_text: The Lord began to speak to Hosea
with a message for his people
She will give birth to children for you
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀가 너를 위해 자녀들을 낳을 것이다

sentences.original_text: That will show how my people have not been faithful to me
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 내 백성이 나에게 충실하지 않았음을 보여줄 것이다

sentences.original_text: They have turned away from me
and they have served other gods
